org.gephi.datalab.impl

Class GraphElementsControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gephi.datalab.impl.GraphElementsControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphElementsController

    public class GraphElementsControllerImpl
extends Object
implements GraphElementsController
    Implementation of the GraphElementsController interface declared in the Data Laboratory API
    Author:
    Eduardo Ramos
    See Also:
    GraphElementsController

      Creates a node with default id and the given label in the current graph.

      void deleteEdge(org.gephi.graph.api.Edge edge)
      Tries to delete an edge checking first if it is on the graph.
      void deleteEdges(org.gephi.graph.api.Edge[] edges)
      Tries to delete an array of edges checking first if they are on the graph.
      void deleteEdgesWithNodes(org.gephi.graph.api.Edge[] edges, boolean deleteSource, boolean deleteTarget)
      Tries to delete an array of edges checking first if they are on the graph and also deletes their source and target node if it is indicated.

      Tries to delete an edge checking first if it is on the graph and also deletes its source and target node if it is indicated.

      Tries to delete a node checking first if it is on the graph.
      void deleteNodes(org.gephi.graph.api.Node[] nodes)
      Tries to delete an array of nodes checking first if they are on the graph.

      Duplicates a node if it is in the graph, and returns the new node.

      Tries to duplicate an array of nodes with the same behaviour as duplicateNode method.

      Returns the number of edges in the graph.

      • createNode

        public org.gephi.graph.api.Node createNode(String label,
                                           String id)
        Description copied from interface: GraphElementsController

        Creates a node with the given id and label in the current graph.

        If a node with that id already exists, no node will be created

        Specified by:
        createNode in interface GraphElementsController
        Parameters:
        label - Label for the node
        id - Id for the node
        Returns:
        The new created node or null if a node with the given id already exists

        If a node with that id already exists, no node will be created

      • duplicateNode

        public org.gephi.graph.api.Node duplicateNode(org.gephi.graph.api.Node node)
        Description copied from interface: GraphElementsController

        Duplicates a node if it is in the graph, and returns the new node.

        If the node has children, they are also copied as children of the new node.

        Sets the same properties and attributes for the node as the original node: id, label and AttributeColumns with DATA AttributeOrigin. Does not copy AttributeColumns with COMPUTED AttributeOrigin.

        Specified by:
        duplicateNode in interface GraphElementsController
        Parameters:
        node - Node to copy
        Returns:
        New node

      • duplicateNodes

        public void duplicateNodes(org.gephi.graph.api.Node[] nodes)
        Description copied from interface: GraphElementsController
        Tries to duplicate an array of nodes with the same behaviour as duplicateNode method.
        Specified by:
        duplicateNodes in interface GraphElementsController
        Parameters:
        nodes - Array of nodes to duplicate

      • createEdges

        public void createEdges(org.gephi.graph.api.Node source,
                        org.gephi.graph.api.Node[] allNodes,
                        boolean directed)
        Description copied from interface: GraphElementsController

        Tries to create edges between the source node and all other edges, directed or undirected.

        An edge won't be created if it already exists or is a self-loop.

        Specified by:
        createEdges in interface GraphElementsController
        Parameters:
        source - Source node
        allNodes - All edges
        directed - Indicates if the edges have to be directed

      • mergeNodes

        public org.gephi.graph.api.Node mergeNodes(org.gephi.graph.api.Graph graph,
                                           org.gephi.graph.api.Node[] nodes,
                                           org.gephi.graph.api.Node selectedNode,
                                           org.gephi.graph.api.Column[] columns,
                                           AttributeRowsMergeStrategy[] mergeStrategies,
                                           boolean deleteMergedNodes)
        Description copied from interface: GraphElementsController
        Merges 2 or more nodes into a new one node that has all the edges of the merged nodes. An AttributeRowsMergeStrategy must be provided for each column of the nodes.
        Specified by:
        mergeNodes in interface GraphElementsController
        Parameters:
        graph - Graph that contains the nodes
        nodes - Nodes to merge (at least 1)
        selectedNode - Main selected node of the nodes to merge (or null to use first node)
        columns - Columns to apply a merge strategy in each row
        mergeStrategies - Strategies to merge rows of each column in columns
        deleteMergedNodes - Indicates if merged nodes should be deleted
        Returns:
        New resulting node
